title: Verify: Implement Core Applets: Image Gen, Memory, HTTP, Code, Transform, If/Else, Merge
description:
Run automated tests for task T-026.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Implement new universal applets: Image Gen Node, upgraded Memory Node (persistent vector store), HTTP Request Node, Code Node (sandboxed), Transform Node, If/Else Node, Merge Node.
Criteria:
- All core applets implemented and registered
- Each applet passes unit tests
- Code Node uses sandboxed subprocess with resource limits
acceptance_criteria: All core applets implemented and registered
